Author: marajoscan1
Text: She knows about it (b/p), but I'm going to try to explain her again.

Author: thr0wawaynametaken
Text: i am so sorry your mother doesn't understand :( have you told her about the binging and purging? i think you may have to.  most people with bulimia - and most people with eating disorders as a whole - are not underweight! behaviors and how you think define eating disorders, not weight.  i am sorry she is being so invalidating and i hope she is receptive to a talk and maybe some online resources to explain that weight =/= eating disorder?
